alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 18 at 10:47PM EST until November 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Lake Effect Snow Warning, snow has ended with no additional accumulation expected tonight. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 inches or more possible in the most persistent lake snows. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Erie county. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect a burst of heavy lake effect snow Saturday evening with a cold frontal passage, with bands of locally heavy snow continuing into the day Sunday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
